snippet: The struggling Brooklyn Nets on Sunday appointed Atlanta Hawks assistant Kenny Atkinson as their new head coach, a position he will fill once his postseason commitments are over....
lead_paragraph: The struggling Brooklyn Nets on Sunday appointed Atlanta Hawks assistant Kenny Atkinson as their new head coach, a position he will fill once his postseason commitments are over.

headline.main: Nets Appoint Hawks Assistant Atkinson as New Head Coach
headline.print_headline: Nets Appoint Hawks Assistant Atkinson as New Head Coach
